properties.title: BikerBerg Flumserberg
properties.abstract: At BikerBerg Flumserberg four biker trails of 13 kilometres invite with magnificent views of the Churfirsten ridge to flowy rides down the hill. A lot of fun for experts, perfect for beginners and families.
properties.description:
The four biker trails of easy or moderate difficulty and with a total length of 13 km can be comfortably reached with the 12-passenger gondola cable car Prodalp Express and the 8-passenger chairlift Prodkamm. 

# BlueSalamander

Perfect for beginners and families. BlueSalmander winds over 3.8 km from Prodalp to Tannenheim and has more than 40 curves, several jumps, wooden elements and waves.
Difficulty: easy (blue)
Length/width/altimeters: 3.8 km / approx. 1.5 m / -356 m 

# RedFox

From Prodkamm 1939m the trail leads with a lot of flow, an impressive mountain panorama and Alpine flair back to Prodalp 1576 m.
Difficulty: moderate (red)
Length/width/altimeters: 3.5 km / approx. 0.8 m / -363 m

# RedRock

Leads after the junction of RedFox with a lot of variety along Alpine meadows, over small bridges past the red rock face and finally through the forest to Tannenboden.
Difficulty: moderate (red)
Length/width/altimeters: 3.7 km / approx. 0.8 m / -320 m

# BlueBunny

Connects the villages Tannenboden and Tannenheim with short pedalling sections, constructed waves and curves. 
Difficulty: easy (blue)
Length/width/altimeters: 1.8 km / approx. 0.8 m / -70 m

The mountain restaurant Prodalp and its FahrBar are the central biker hangouts at Flumserberg and offer besides delicious dishes and cool drinks also a walking bike course for little ones. The BikerShop Flumserberg – the first national test centre from intercycle – and the BikerCamping complete the attractive total offer for bikers at Flumserberg.
properties.name: Bergbahnen Flumserberg AG
